name: should use from-table optimization with 7 columns from multiple sources
description: Tests from-table optimization with scoring format seasonlogs as FROM table, joining league format seasonlogs, weighted opportunity CTE, and player seasonlogs. Verifies scoring_format_hash and year conditions appear in WHERE clause.
expected_query: with "t921c4eef56c18545410ce1daa2b41466" as (select "pg"."pid", ROUND((1.5 * COUNT(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.trg_pid = pg.pid THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0)) + (0.7 * SUM(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.trg_pid = pg.pid THEN nfl_plays.dot ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(SUM(nfl_plays.dot), 0)), 4) as weighted_opp_rating_from_plays from "nfl_plays" inner join "player_gamelogs" as "pg" on "nfl_plays"."esbid" = "pg"."esbid" and "nfl_plays"."off" = "pg"."tm" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and ("trg_pid" is not null) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "pg"."pid") select "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."points" AS "points_from_seasonlogs_0", "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."points_per_game" AS "points_per_game_from_seasonlogs_0", "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."points_rnk" AS "points_rnk_from_seasonlogs_0", "t94859e7d2e6814eb5ed62cc33ece2b74"."points_added" AS "points_added_from_seasonlogs_0", "t94859e7d2e6814eb5ed62cc33ece2b74"."points_added_per_game" AS "points_added_per_game_from_seasonlogs_0", "t921c4eef56c18545410ce1daa2b41466"."weighted_opp_rating_from_plays" AS "weighted_opp_rating_from_plays_0", "player_seasonlogs"."espn_overall_score" AS "espn_overall_score_0", "player"."pos" from "scoring_format_player_seasonlogs" as "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd" inner join "player" on "player"."pid" = "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."pid" left join "league_format_player_seasonlogs" as "t94859e7d2e6814eb5ed62cc33ece2b74" on "t94859e7d2e6814eb5ed62cc33ece2b74"."pid" = "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."pid" and t94859e7d2e6814eb5ed62cc33ece2b74.league_format_hash = 'a54416be9596b2a3dbdac2c5fd40d0bea908cd74b84e16416713bbaf45c6bfc5' and t94859e7d2e6814eb5ed62cc33ece2b74.year IN (2024) left join "t921c4eef56c18545410ce1daa2b41466" on "t921c4eef56c18545410ce1daa2b41466"."pid" = "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."pid" left join "player_seasonlogs" on "player_seasonlogs"."pid" = "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."pid" and "player_seasonlogs"."seas_type" = 'REG' and "player_seasonlogs"."year" = 2025 where "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."scoring_format_hash" = 'ad64bf40cdfec0a1ebdf66453fa57687832f7556f3870251c044d5d270fc089e' and "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."year" = 2024 and player.pos IN ('RB', 'WR', 'TE') group by player.fname, player.lname, "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."points", "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."points_per_game", "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."points_rnk", "t94859e7d2e6814eb5ed62cc33ece2b74"."points_added", "t94859e7d2e6814eb5ed62cc33ece2b74"."points_added_per_game", "t921c4eef56c18545410ce1daa2b41466"."weighted_opp_rating_from_plays", "player_seasonlogs"."espn_overall_score", "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 DESC NULLS LAST, "t363940a466a7e5e5b4624ffc010a5ebd"."pid" asc limit 500
